languages.text: Даже рассредоточенные и малочисленные, отряды Несущих Слово представляли смертельную угрозу. Но инициатива была в наших руках, и мы не собирались ее упускать.

traits.locale_text: Даже рассредоточенные и малочисленные отряды Несущих слово представляли смертельную угрозу для нас. Но это давало нам шанс. Маленький, но шанс.

languages.text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.
languages.original_text: Даже рассредоточенные и малочисленные, отряды Несущих Слово представляли смертельную угрозу. Но инициатива была в наших руках, и мы не собирались ее упускать.

traits.locale_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But the initiative was ours, and we had no intention of losing it.
Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But the initiative was ours, and we had no intention of losing it.
Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But the initiative was ours, and we had no intention of losing it.
Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But the initiative was ours, and we had no intention of losing it.
Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.
Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.

languages.text: 即使那些怀言者人数很少，各自为战，他们依然是极其致命的威胁。不过，主动权在我们手中，而我们并不打算错失先机。
languages.original_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.

traits.locale_text: 即使那些怀言者人数很少，各自为战，他们依然是极其致命的威胁。不过，主动权在我们手中，而我们并不打算错失这个良机。

languages.text: Même divisés et en sous-nombre, les Word Bearers étaient plus que redoutables, mais nous avions l'avantage et nous comptions bien le garder.
languages.original_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.

traits.locale_text: Même divisés et en sous-nombre, les Word Bearers étaient plus que redoutables, mais nous avions l'initiative et nous comptions bien la garder.

languages.text: 分断され数が少なくても、ワードベアラーは致命的な脅威だった。しかし我々にはアドバンテージがあり、それを手渡すつもりもなかった。
languages.original_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.

traits.locale_text: 分断され数が少なくても、ワードベアラーは致命的な脅威だった。しかし我々にはアドバンテージがあり、それを手渡すつもりもなかった。

languages.text: Incluso siendo pocos y estando divididos, los Portadores de la Palabra eran una amenaza letal. Pero teníamos la ventaja y no pensábamos cedérsela.
languages.original_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.

traits.locale_text: Incluso siendo pocos y estando divididos, los Portadores de la Palabra eran una amenaza letal. Pero teníamos la iniciativa y no pensábamos cedérsela.

languages.text: Selbst zerstreut und dezimiert stellten die Word Bearers eine tödliche Gefahr dar. Doch der Vorteil war auf unserer Seite, und wir hatten nicht vor, ihn wieder abzugeben.
languages.original_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.

traits.locale_text: Selbst zerstreut und dezimiert stellten die Word Bearers eine tödliche Gefahr dar. Doch die Initiative war auf unserer Seite, und wir hatten nicht vor, sie wieder abzugeben.

languages.text: Bölünmüş ve sayıca az oldukları hâlde Vahyedenler, ölümcül bir tehdit oluşturuyordu. Ancak koşullar lehimizeydi, üstünlüğü kaybetmeye niyetimiz yoktu.
languages.original_text: Even divided and few in number, the Word Bearers posed a mortal threat. But we had the advantage, and we had no intention of losing it.
